title: serve executor
description: serves the template's api in a docker container

logFile.description: path to logFile used for lambda logs

envFile.description: (root relative) path to env file used for setting env variables in lambda functions

templateFile.description: (root relative) path to template file used as source for sam

gitBranchToCorrespondingStackName.description: object representing a map of {[key: gitBranch]: stackName}
